attributes.action: ensure that diesel tourist buses are not classified as PSVs to get the fuel discount.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Public Service Vehicles get their fuel cheaper - so the tourists buses are constantly touring around a particular route - often with no-one on board.  They should not operate when they have less than 10 passengers on board.  They are polluting the atmosphere of our historic city centres.
